page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO MENSTRIE
page.content: Menstrie is a village situated in the centre of Scotland. It is bordered on the north side by the{Ochil Hills}and is near to the River Devon. Menstrie is nearly all a residential area from which most working adults commute to nearby Stirling, Glasgow and Edinburgh. Menstrie has an active village life with many clubs catering for every age group. There is a surprisingly large number of old folks living in Menstrie. Many have spent their whole life in the village. There is a large continental coach hire firm based in the village. When a new primary school was built, a Youth and Community Centre was established in the old school premises.
